msg:This hotel was amazing. We were on our honeymoon and had 3 days in Beijing. Our room was beautiful and on the 22nd floor with a amazing view of the city. The round bath tub in the room was amazing. The bed was super comfy and huge. The room was set up with balloons on our arrival and a delicious cake bought to our room in the evening.
All the staff were very helpful and always tried their best efforts.
I would recommend opting in for their breakfast when booking, it is really really good. Lots of different cuisine options, yes for breakfast!!
Jenson in the concierge was super helpful with great English and guided us to maximise our 3night stay in Beijing. Big thank you to him (I think his name could be spelt different).

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in May 2024
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:3.7
posted:Posted May 24, 2024
msg:This used to be the old W hotel. The location isn't bad, there are places to get coffee, food, and convenience stores within walking distance. Because it's the old W, the decor is rather dark and the hotel could use a renovation. The swimming pool has only 3 lanes and the gym's lighting makes it feel like you're walking into a club. There's a tub in the middle of the rooms along with the sink so if you're staying in a room with someone else, it's easy to make a lot of noise when you're getting ready in the morning. Lots of mirrors in the room too, with adjustable RGB ambient lighting. When you order delivery from outside food vendors, it's delivered to your room via robot, pretty cool. The cleaning staff are motivated and very friendly. The front desk are very helpful as well, I had a good experience with Leah who helped me with my stay.
----------------------------------------

msg:We stayed at the hotel just for one night and Beijing's governments was curbing the recent COVID outbreak at that time, so some facilities were either not available or open hours have been adjusted.
Overall we had more than great experience. Our room was on the 23rd floor which has a decent view both in the morning, evening and night.
The room is spacious and light. Everything was clean and properly managed.
The bed is really big but seemed a bit soft for me.
Bathtub is nice and if you and your significant other are not very tall, you'll definitely be aby to fit together.
Food and drinks were good but not particularly wow thb, but there's plenty bars and restaurants nearby so it's not a problem. 
I might not recommend it for a long stay, but a great choice for a couple of nights

name:A‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äç_‚ÄçI‚Äçn‚Äçt‚Äçl
info:Deluxe King Room

info:Business travelers
info:4 Reviews

posted:Posted March 3, 2022
msg:Overall, I had a great stay at the Sofitel this time. The only reason I rated their service a 4 out of 5, was because the check-in process was very lengthy. It took about 15 minutes to check in on the day. If this were streamlined (especially for foreigners) it would be an even better experience. Management should look into this if they truly want to offer their guests a five star experience. 
I also rated their cleanliness a 4 out of 5, solely because there were dried water marks and toothpaste in the sink and handprints on the window in the office area. They also didn‚Äôt offer any bubble bath/bath salts for the bath, which is counterintuitive (I‚Äôd have gladly paid for this extra touch/option.) 
It‚Äôs in a great location, easy to get cabs to and from the hotel. 
The bed was very comfortable and the room I stayed in, spacious. 
I‚Äôd definitely return, though, because of the convenience and the quality of the bed - especially after traveling!

posted:Posted April 5, 2022
msg:Good looking on the surface but flaws very quickly start to show. We booked the premier suite which was a massive space with a great view. But for all the room there was barely anywhere to store belongings. The room provided a walk in closet but no drawers and very little practical space. Bed was comfortable but the air was either too dry or unclean. We both had difficulty breathing at night and unusually dry and irritated skin. Showers were
Amazing. Breakfast had many options but the quality was lacking. The hotel did provide a very generous amount of water which I suppose they did to make up for the dry air. Staff were dismissive and the cleaning service was understaffed, late, and did the bare minimum in cleaning. I blame management for this blunder. The cleaning lady was very nice. The price and location were both good, but I doubt we will ever visit again. Beijing as numerous better options at similar prices.

name:Y‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçr‚Äç ‚ÄçJ‚Äça‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçc‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äç ‚ÄçG‚Äçi‚Äçr‚Äçl
info:Deluxe Room (2 beds)
info:Stayed in August 2021
info:Friends
info:6 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted August 10, 2021
msg:Given the recent uproar with the virus and the ongoing restrictions, my friend and I were forced to celebrate her birthday with a #staycation. Even though we were a bit disheartened at first, but Sofitel Beijing Central did not disappoint.
The hotel provides extraordinary service. The staff is hospitable and very helpful. They were also able to communicate in English. The check-in process was very easy, all that was required of foreign nationals was the health kit.

The room was very clean and came with a breathtaking view of the city. It was equipped with  an iron, toiletries, refrigerator, humidifier, TV, among others.
Other services included the spa, indoor swimming pool, whirlpool, sauna, fitness center and restaurant. They offer a wide range of food choices, both Chinese and Western but you also have the option of checking out cool spots close by or ordering your favorite take out.

Overall, it was a remarkable experience and I will most certainly visit again.

The hotel's waiters, Sun Xiuhua and Zhang Fengwei, provided thoughtful service, cleaned the room meticulously, and delivered the items that needed to be replenished as soon as possible. The supervisors, Lu Ping and Ma Chuang, were very warm and friendly, and gave us a lot of advice and help, making us feel at home. The food provided by the hotel for breakfast was diverse, rich and delicious! In general, this is a first-class service hotel that is highly recommended! ¬∑„ÄêLocation„ÄëSofitel is less than 10 minutes away from Tiananmen Square by car. It is next to Jianguomen subway station. It is in the core location of the Second Ring Road. It is very convenient to go anywhere! It must be the first choice for tourism! ! !
¬∑„ÄêRoom„ÄëSofitel's room is very large. This time I chose a twin room. Only Ctrip had it that day (not on Accor...). The twin bed seemed to be 1.3 meters. Because the room space itself is very large, the two large twin beds are also very coordinated. It is really unique to be able to have a room of this size on the Second Ring Road! His big beds are also 2-meter king-size beds!
¬∑„ÄêDecoration„ÄëThe most feared thing about hotels in Beijing is that they are expensive and oldüôä, especially the big hotels within the Third Ring Road. However, Sofitel's decoration style and facilities are relatively new, and the decoration is very avant-garde, especially suitable for dating. The open round bathtub in the roomüõÅ is very a**ospheric. Their lobby is really like a bar!
¬∑„ÄêService„ÄëThis time, Xiao Liang and Xiao Xu checked in for me. I placed an order on the spot after I arrived at the hotel and saw that the room was ok. The reservation depar**ent was very fast, and the front desk confirmed the order with a phone call! Xiao Liang checked in for me and took the initiative to understand my preferences for the room orientation and floor to arrange a room for me. Xiao Xu next to me also assisted in the processing and greeted my family. My mother said that this hotel is very cultivated, and the overall feeling is very friendly and kind. A willingness to consider the guests and think about problems from the perspective of the guests gives people an impressive warmth. When we choose a hotel, in addition to the decoration and location, the warmth that the hotel brings to people is the most lasting memory. The experience is comfortable and I feel very good in my heart~
It‚Äôs a pity that I didn‚Äôt have time to experience the Sofitel swimming pool. I saw a photo of a very popular internet celebrity coming here to swim and check in before. It has a very artistic texture. I look forward to experiencing it again next time! !
A successful May Day holiday brought a very unforgettable trip to Beijing for the family!

msg:The location of the hotel is very good, not far from the subway, and it is convenient to call a taxi.
The service is very good. Even though there are many guests and few staff during the Spring Festival, the service quality is still good. There was a one-to-one contact with the housekeeper before check-in, and someone took the initiative to pull the car door when I got off the car at the door.
Let‚Äôs focus on breakfast. There are really many guests during the Spring Festival. If you go to eat after 8 o'clock, you have to wait for a table. You don't even have time to clear the table, and there are no clean dishes, chopsticks and paper towels. But even under this situation, the service attitude is still very good. Any hotel staff I find will respond politely and actively and help solve the problem. There is no impatience or impatience at all. It can be seen that if it is not the peak period, the service quality will be even better. This is a huge plus. The variety of breakfast is also good, and the pattern will change slightly every day. It also provides several flavors to satisfy tourists from all over the world.
The room is large and very friendly for people traveling with children. After a busy day, there is still enough space for everyone to enjoy peace and quiet in the hotel room. The facilities and sanitation are also good. The only drawback is the lack of lighting. From the lobby to the room, it is always not bright enough.

Don't be so unreliable. Let‚Äôs talk about service. Major platforms promote seafood buffet for two, and it says ‚ÄúAvailable on weekends and holidays.‚Äù Most people will understand that it can be used on weekdays and weekends and holidays, because most of the preferential packages are limited to mid-week. Since it says that it is available on weekends, It can be used. It must be available in the middle of the week. However, when I went there, I found that the restaurant was not open at all. When I called the hotel, I couldn't explain it clearly. I just said "it is not available today." After negotiating with the hotel, Ctrip learned that the buffet package was only available on Friday dinner and Saturday and Sunday lunch and dinner. It also didn‚Äôt know how the hotel provided the copy. Ctrip only revised the product description after communicating with the hotel. I'm usually very tolerant, but this hotel really made me unhappy. It was originally because I wanted to find a unique hotel for my birthday, but I was disappointed. I gave it 2 points because the breakfast is a bit special (Beijing snacks) and the doorman is enthusiastic and reliable. Little Potato from the South has just finished playing in the Northeast. When you enter the hotel room, you will feel very comfortable and the room is warm. I knew that the hotel had a disposable bath bag that I brought with me in the bathtub. I tried it and found that the size was wrong. I contacted the housekeeper and asked for tape. Later, the lady in charge of the 18th floor came to inquire about my needs and brought me a matching bath bag. , afraid that we would be too hot, so we took a few extra bottles of water. This will be the case every day for the next few days, and disposable bath bags will also be added. Every time I meet someone, I see someone with a smile on their face and a warm greeting, like a friend.

Hygiene: The bathroom floor, sink, and toilet are all clean.

It was too hot when I slept at night. I couldn't adapt to it for a while. If you ask to open the window, you need to sign a liability exemption agreement. It will be noisy if you open the window, after all, the road is right outside the window.
Breakfast is in B1, there are quite a lot of dishes, noodles, wontons and eggs are made on site. There is always an acceptable Western style or Chinese style, and most of the flavors are acceptable in my opinion. There will be some different dishes every day.

msg:The environment near the hotel is not very good. There are rotten lands under construction. Every time you pass back and forth, your shoes will be full of mud, and there is a bad smell every time you pass by.
It is not too close to the Jianguomen subway, at least a 10-minute walk.
The service attitude of the staff is good (including the front desk, the B1 restaurant and the uncle who cleans up the room). However, the cleaning speed on the breakfast table in B1 is relatively slow, and the tableware is not complete. There are also buckets near the diners in the venue that leak water. What is even more frightening is that some guests sneezed and coughed on the uncovered noodles and rice. I also saw the staff flipping the food (pancake) with bare hands (without gloves/tongs).
Dissatisfied and we should be able to check in at 3pm, but we have to wait until almost 4pm to enter the room. Also, we were assigned to the lower floor, even if all the lights were turned on, the room was still dark, and one light in the room was out of order. Some items in the room showed signs of damage.
The bathtub in the room was poorly drained, and it took half a day for the water to run dry. Sometimes there is a bad smell from the wash basin.
The most dissatisfactory thing is that the website says that there is a laundry room, but when I went to the hotel, I found that there is no such thing. The hotel can arrange laundry service ($60 for wet cleaning of 1 piece of clothing), which made us lose our budget and had to wash clothes by hand every night.

Every time I take out food, it‚Äôs like ******** on luck. Oh, there‚Äôs no such thing as luck. Stuck in the elevator for a few minutes, and then go to the front desk to refill? ? ? The front desk said that one room cannot have two key cards, so why did you give me two? It is said that it was degaussed because of two room cards? ? ? I don't understand this even more. I've stayed in many Sofitel hotels, but what's wrong with this one in Beijing? No wonder there are so many bad reviews. When you check out, the front desk is still trying to get a good review?

No matter how well the front lobby is decorated, the overall service will be as bad~

posted:Posted June 20, 2023
msg:The family travels, just from Shanghai to Beijing Railway Station, and chose the Sofitel Hotel. The hotel is very close to Beijing Railway Station, just 15 minutes walk. But because it is next to the overpass, you have to turn around from the small road when driving. It is also four or five kilometers away from Tiananmen Square, the Forbidden City and other scenic spots, so it is convenient to travel.
Four people travel, the luxury suite is very convenient, two rooms, two two-meter-large beds. The room is 100 square meters, very large and spacious, and relatively new. Half of them are floor-to-ceiling large glass windows, with a particularly good view.
There are two bathrooms in the room, one shower room (two is perfect), a large round bathtub, and three washstands.

The hardware is sufficient, but the software service feels poor. Four people can book breakfast for four people in a four-person room. The breakfast variety is not very rich in terms of price, and the table cleaning and tableware placement are a bit late.

posted:Posted April 3, 2023
msg:Hotel Location: Near Jianguomen Subway Station. It takes less than 5 minutes to walk from the hotel to the Subway Station. It is very close and the transportation is very convenient. There are Lines 1 and 2.

Hotel facilities: The hotel facilities are still a bit old, for example, the paint on the cabinet door for the refrigerator is a little off. Other than this, everything else is fine! The hotel mattress is very comfortable, I am picky about the bed. Some 5-star beds will cause some discomfort the next day after a night's sleep, such as backache and stiff neck. But there is no bed in Sofitel, the bed is very soft when sitting on it, but it is just right for the whole person to lie on. Although I booked a standard room with two single beds, the bed is more than enough for two people, so don't worry if you have a baby. The lighting in the room is a bit dim. . . In fact, there is no need to do this. But it varies from person to person.

Hotel service: By the way, soft drinks in the refrigerator are provided every day, free of charge! This is a plus!

The hotel also has a heated swimming pool, and you can bring a swimsuit if you need it.

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe Room (2 beds)
info:Stayed in January 2023
info:Friends
info:1 Review
rating:2
posted:Posted January 12, 2023
msg:This hotel's high rating of 4.9 should be due to the fact that the customer service will chase you to give it a good review after you check out.
Let me tell you my sincere feelings. The lobby and front desk of the hotel are not up to five-star standards. They are incomparable with Sofitels in other cities. The front desk of this hotel is a bit like Crystal Orange.
There is only one person at the front desk, and he also has to take care of the checkout at the lobby bar, as well as check-in and check-out. It seems that he is too busy at all.
There is no concierge, no luggage trolley or bellman, so you have to carry your luggage yourself.
There is an elevator attendant at the elevator, but the elevator attendant does not have an elevator card, so he has to swipe the card by himself. If he does not bring a card for takeout, he has to go to the front desk to get a replacement. This elevator attendant is redundant, so it is better to go to the reception desk to get your luggage.
After entering the room, there were red, green, and blue background lights. I was shocked when I walked in. The a**osphere of the room looked like a top-notch hotel, and it felt very cheap.
The standard room we booked came with a set of nightgowns.
There is no trash can in the bathroom. If women's sanitary napkins are placed directly on the toilet paper table, it is extremely disgusting.
Turn off the red background light and you can‚Äôt even find the switch.
It wants scenery but not scenery, it wants service but not service, it wants class but not class. Anyway, the sense of value is only three hundred, no more.
The price is similar, but the service is incomparable with Legend Hotel. Although the hotel facilities are older, the experience is much better than Sofitel.

posted:Posted December 29, 2022
msg:I am staying at Sofitel Beijing for 4 consecutive days from December 23rd to 27th, 2022. Now share my experience. The hotel has complete facilities, and the sanitation is also very good. On the last day, I was upgraded to the elite hotel floor for free. The service of the hotel is very good, and there is another thing that is particularly touching. The hotel's breakfast is particularly rich, with Western and Chinese styles. For frequent hotel stays, I especially like hotels with breakfast, especially western breakfast. I personally like baguette ü•ñ, you can pack bacon ü•ì, omelette, ham slices and other salty foods; you can also pack sweet foods such as jam and butter üßà. Therefore, the hotel's breakfast has baguettes ü•ñ, which is very OK. If you can eat authentic baguettes that are crispy on the outside and soft on the inside, that would be great. On the morning of the 26th, I went to the restaurant of the hotel and found a baguette. I just didn‚Äôt see the knife for cutting the baguette. The waiter in the back kitchen saw it and immediately helped me get it. On the morning of the 27th, when I went to the restaurant again, the lady from yesterday immediately introduced to me that today‚Äôs baguettes are very fresh, just out of the oven. I specifically asked, do you remember me? Because I am wearing a mask. The young lady said that she remembered me as the one who held the baguette knife yesterday. A small detail moved me, it was very warm and felt like home.
      Now for the small inadequacies. I am a person who likes to swim, and the hotel happens to have an indoor heated swimming pool. At about 10:30 in the morning on the 27th, I went directly to the third floor of the hotel and was going to ask the little brother in the swimming pool what to bring. As a result, the little brother said that the swimming pool and gymnasium need nucleic acid within 48 hours. This stumps me. Now that hotel accommodation no longer looks at nucleic acid, who would go out of their way to do nucleic acid. After returning to the room, I called the front desk and kept talking. Nor does it reflect the situation. This regulation of the swimming pool and gymnasium is clearly not allowing you to enter, and it looks high-sounding. Without 48 hours of nucleic acid, you don't even think about going into the water. Well, I respect your rules and stop swimming because I don‚Äôt have 48-hour nucleic acid. Later, the little brother said, let me visit the facilities inside. Well, I checked the swimming pool, but I didn't enter the water.
        I hope that the hotel's services can be synchronized so that guests can avoid detours. At the same time, I also wish the hotel business is getting better and better, and I can continue to check in next time I come to Beijing.
        At the end of the article, I attach a few photos I took in Beijing.

msg:This time I booked a room for a friend (********* + Malay). I have stayed at Sofitel in different countries and cities many times and I always feel good. But my friend‚Äôs experience was very poor this time. 1. The location is inconvenient. Although it is on the edge of the Second Ring Road, it is quite inconvenient to get in and out. Whether you are driving or walking, you have to walk a long way to find something to eat (this may not be changed for the time being, but the convenience and hotel brand does not match); 2. The facilities are average and the hotel door is very small. When my friend checked in at night, he thought I had booked a copycat hotel. The door is small and the signboard is even smaller (you can‚Äôt see it if you don‚Äôt look carefully); the lobby is relatively narrow and should It is three-star level, and it is difficult to reach four-star level; 3. The lighting in the lobby and other public areas is very dark (the hotel explains this style), but as an engineer who has been working in the industry for many years, I know very well that the lighting is not enough. 4. Air conditioning is not allowed in the room. Guests have been complaining that the room is stuffy. The hotel replied that it is the same across Beijing and air conditioning will not be turned on in April (I have not verified this, so I don‚Äôt know whether it is true or not. But I think it is a bit ridiculous); 5. The service attitude of the hotel staff is rather bureaucratic and they are pushy and pushy.
The guest finally couldn't bear it anymore and moved to the Regent Hotel (East Fourth) at midnight on the third night, and all the problems disappeared.
Guests still doubt whether I encountered a copycat version of Sofitel.

       Because I temporarily decided to stay in a hotel, I didn't bring a charger.        Let's talk about the lobby. Now when the lobby is waiting for check-out, it's like standing outside. The lobby is cold and swish. The two floors enter the gate. name:A‚Äçn‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçy‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr
info:Deluxe King Room
info:Stayed in January 2022
info:Couples
info:9 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted January 18, 2022
msg:The beer and drinks in the mini bar of the hotel are free, and they are replenished once a day. The hotel has free mineral water, and 2 bottles of water are replenished every day. The view and lighting of the room are great, whether on the ground floor or on the upper floor. I booked a deluxe double bed room, the room is very tall, and the background a**osphere light can change the color. There is no feeling like the express hotel in the comments. The bathtub doesn't look like much from the photos, but when you check in in person, it's more than enough for 3 people to soak in it! The room area is 50 square meters. Due to the floor-to-ceiling mirror design that can be seen everywhere, the room looks bigger visually! The shower and toilet are separate and have doors. The dressing room is also separate. The external sound insulation of the room is very good. It is impossible to hear the sound of the traffic and the road, but if someone walks in the corridor with laughter and passes by the door of the room, they will still hear the sound. The overall sound insulation is no problem. Hotel curtains are 100% blackout, and those who wake up late absolutely love it. There is a curtain between the bed and the bathtub. After pulling it, the small suite that can directly divide the room into two parts is also shaded. Turn on the light on the bathtub and toilet side, and the person sleeping on the bed will never see the light. . The hotel has bathrobes and slippers, which are changed every day. Shampoo, conditioner, shower gel, skin care lotion (moisturizing lotion for the body) are all complete, and they will be replenished every day. The toilet will provide 2 rolls of paper. Replenished daily. Toothbrushes, cotton pads, cotton swabs, razors, hair dryers are all available. Although the room air conditioner can be adjusted, the maximum is 26.5 degrees. Maybe the room is too big and it will not be particularly hot. It didn't get hot for 3 days in a row. The most important thing is that it is very convenient to the subway. Exit B of Jianguomen of Line 1, go out of the hotel gate, turn right and go straight about 200 meters to the subway entrance. This station is convenient to go anywhere. The 2 stops on the left are Tiananmen Square, Wangfujing, Dongcheng/Chaoyang, and it is not far by taxi. It takes 15 minutes to Taikoo Li in Sanlitun. No need to change lines, just sit down and the final stop is Universal Studios. A few stops from the left side is the Beijing West Railway Station. All in all, it is very convenient. I didn't eat breakfast, lunch or dinner at the hotel, so I won't make any comments. When I come to Beijing, I have to eat roast duck, more delicious. !

msg:I saw several hotels before I went, and finally chose this one. The location is good and the transportation is relatively convenient. It takes about 6,7 minutes to walk to the Jianguomen Metro Station of Line 1.
The hotel lobby is too dark. I walked in and rubbed it secretly. When I got there, it was sunny outside. I felt blind as soon as I entered.
The front desk is too small and there is no guide. It depends on queuing up one by one. You can judge where you are and see the situation on your own. Is it so difficult to arrange personal management?
I booked the room more than a month in advance, 4 nights, maybe because it is relatively cheap, the room location provided by the hotel is very poor, the hotel has more than 20 floors, gave us the lowest floor of the guest room on the fifth floor, visual inspection of the fifth floor is the swimming pool The open-air roof has no view at all. I asked if I could give a higher floor, and replied that the rooms are full. Later, after my family and I made a complaint, the front desk said that there was a vacant room on the 7th floor. Haha, well, although there is no sight at all. But I am grateful for the front desk to adjust as much as possible. The room is close to the elevator and it is very convenient to get in and out.
The background wall in the room was flickering and flashing, perhaps more suitable for young people, nightclub style. The background wall cannot be closed alone. Call the front desk, and the front desk said you can turn off the main switch and turn on some of the lights, okay. At that time, I finally understood the purpose of the tripod lamp in the corner of each room.
There are many varieties of drinks in the minibar, and they are free. It‚Äôs great to come back to drink a can of iced Coke after a day out. The daily replenishment is also very complete. One day, I gave two extra cans of juice suitable for children. Thank you.
The bathroom is generally clean. In such a busy hotel, it is impossible to ask them to clean it spotlessly every day. Anyway, we change our own toilet cover every day, wipe it with alcohol wipes, and solve it by ourselves. Special thanks to the guest room aunt. One time we arrived late and found that the soap was gone, and the slippers were broken. We called the front desk to deliver it again and again. The aunt was not impatient, and finally we were embarrassed.
One thing to mention is that the sliding door of the bathroom is defective. I was an adult who got his hand caught when opening the door. One of the two sliding doors seemed to be stuck. Pulling the groove would not open at all. It can be opened by friction against the door, and then. . . . . The handle is clamped, it is recommended that the hotel check this kind of equipment more, it will wear out and degrade over time.
Generally speaking, except that the decoration style is not my dish, everything else is fine.
Finally, remind everyone that the door of the mini bar cannot be closed, don‚Äôt waste your effort hahahahaha

Front office manager Angelina went above and beyond, arranging and decorating our room, upgrading us, and even presenting a delightful little cake. My girlfriend was ecstatic. A huge thanks to Angelina and the hotel staff for their professionalism and warmth, making the celebration all the more special.
